duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct research on various investment related topics, including individual mutual funds, separately managed accounts, alternative investments, stocks, and bonds.
Collaborate with other team members to research and recommend investment solutions for clients.
Prepare reports to illustrate structural and statistical characteristics of investment portfolios, vehicles, and strategies.
Engage regularly with leading money management firms as part of ongoing research activities.
Develop research materials and present to our research committee on topics related to various asset classes and investment vehicles.

education_certification.credential: Pursuing a bachelor’s degree in finance, economics, or a related field with the goal of successfully obtaining your CFA designation.
